ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(RW_Registration_Type__c, 'E-Registration') , ISPICKVAL(RW_Registration_Status__c, 'Registration Completed') ) , ISBLANK( RW_Sub_Registrar_Office_Date__c ) , null), $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_booking == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the SRO Date if E- Registration
